description: "This is a minimal example of using the officedown package to write a Word document."

```{r include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(officedown)
library(officer)
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, tab.lp="Table:", fig.lp="Figure:")
bkm <- run_bookmark
any_zz <- list(
  run_word_field("STYLEREF 1 \\s"),
  ftext("."),
  run_seqfield(seqfield = "SEQ fig \u005C* Arabic")
)
one_zz <- list(
  run_word_field("STYLEREF 1 \\s"),
  ftext("."),
  run_seqfield(seqfield = "SEQ fig \u005C* Arabic \\r 1")
)
```


```{r}
block_toc(level = 1)
```


```{r}
block_toc(seq_id = "fig")
```
